basics.name: Sharon Diep
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am a 2nd year undergraduate student at the Univeristy of Hawaiia at Manoa working towards a B.B.A in Marketing, Management Information Systems, and International Business with a Minor in Fashion Design Merchandising. My expected graduation is Spring 2022.

work.company: Office of Internships and Career Development
work.summary: Student advisor for undergraduate and MBA students looking for help with internships and career development, as well as assisting Patrick Stuart and Rick Varley with scheduling and Career Expo.
highlights: Schedule appointments, answer any questions regarding internships and resumes

work.summary: Applied marketing concepts and skills at a Korean based makeup company
highlights: Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
